title: Most annoying CC comp?

embed.description: Remember to like, comment, rate, subscribe, unsubscribe, post to Facebook, Bebo, MySpace, Anook, Tweet it using the hashtag #snare4keyori, and also remember to like and subscribe guys. Thanks to Holder/MajorLeagueWubs again for his great help during the editing process. ----------------------------------------­----- Try out League of Legends FREE today ► http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=51718cda50a9b247055787 ----------------------------------------­----- Join the Keyring!

body:
I was watching Keyori's Snare Sisters, and I was wondering if anyone could think of a more annoying team composition like this.
I was thinking something along the lines of:
Mao'Kai Top
Zyra JG
Caitlyn ADC
Lux Mid
Morgana Support
Anyone else got any better comps? Might try them out with some friends :)

replies.body:
Garen - top 
Cho - Jungle
Malzahar - mid
Morgana - support
Quinn - ADC

Not only will you be permasilenced, but you wont be able to move or even see.
